description.value:
Various parts of this +2 resilient half plate are forged into the shape of a lion's head. The golden lion heads grant you a commanding presence and seem to actively growl at your enemies, granting you a +2 item bonus to Intimidation.

The lions on the armor work in tandem with the lion on a lion's shield. If you critically hit with the lion's shield using Lion Bite, the lions on the armor roar in support of the shield, causing the target of the shield's Strike to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Activateâ€”Roar of the Pride 2 (concentrate)

Frequency once per day

Effect The lions on your armor roar, attempting to cow your enemies. Attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] each enemy within 30 feet of you. On a critical success, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing] for 1 round.
